name: 余毅航 Yu Yihang
description:
He is a passionate and efficient learner, full of curiosity about various fields and projects.

He has studied multiple well-known English courses and classic English textbooks, which not only enhance his professional competence in the field of computer science but also broaden his perspectives and interests in related fields.

Due to his strong English proficiency and solid theoretical foundation in computer science, he is able to quickly learn and apply multiple programming languages and development tools.

subentries.title: TensorChord
subentries.subtitle: AI+DB Engineer (Intern)
subentries.description:
[pgvecto.rs](https://github.com/tensorchord/pgvecto.rs/) is a PostgreSQL plugin developed in Rust, providing vector data types, operations, and indexing for large language models' storage. Read more on the [blog](https://modelz.ai/blog/pgvecto-rs).

I contributed to the ecosystem of pgvecto.rs by developing a [Python client](https://pypi.org/project/pgvecto_rs/) and integrating it into the [langchain](https://www.langchain.com/) and [LlamaIndex](https://www.llamaindex.ai/) frameworks.

subentries.title: ByteDance - Nuverse
subentries.subtitle: Server Engineer (Intern)
subentries.description:
I participated in the development of the server-side for [Earth: Revival](https://2112.nvsgames.com/), implementing business requirements.

I designed and implemented a static type system based on actual business logic for Lua code, enabling semantic analysis and strengthening the static checking system.

This system serves as a continuous integration (CI) tool for checking common issues in the production environment.

subentries.title: [Apache RocketMQ](https://github.com/apache/rocketmq) C++ Client Message Trace Dynamic Downgrading
subentries.subtitle: [Open Source Promotion Plan](https://summer-ospp.ac.cn/2022/#/org/prodetail/1265)
subentries.description:
[RocketMQ](https://github.com/apache/rocketmq) is a distributed message middleware under Apache. [Message trace](https://github.com/apache/rocketmq/wiki/RIP-6-Message-Trace) is a feature of RocketMQ used for tracking messages, allowing the complete traceability of messages.

In this project, I designed and implemented a dynamic downgrading strategy for the [C++ client](https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-client-cpp) to handle message trace functionality.

subentries.title: [tg_bing_dalle](https://github.com/yihong0618/tg_bing_dalle)
subentries.subtitle: Collaborator
subentries.description: Using Bing Image Creator in Telegram. Demo: [bot](https://t.me/yanli_dalle_bot) | [example](https://t.me/c/1941649644/2798)

subentries.title: [Generative Agents](https://arxiv.org/abs/2304.03442) implemented by [langchain](https://github.com/langchain-ai/langchain/blob/master/libs/experimental/langchain_experimental/generative_agents/generative_agent.py)
subentries.description: Generative Agents: Interactive Simulacra of Human Behavior is an experiment that allows AI to interact in a simulated town game. I implemented the basic functionality of this experiment using the langchain framework [here](https://github.com/langchain-ai/langchain/blob/master/libs/experimental/langchain_experimental/generative_agents/generative_agent.py).

subentries.title: [wxgzh-api](https://github.com/BeautyyuYanli/wxgzh-api): Get the latest articles from any WeChat Official Account
subentries.description: Using Selenium to scrape the latest articles from any WeChat Official Account and wrap them into an HTTP API for retrieval. Built with Docker.

subentries.title: [Study With Nineteen](https://github.com/BeautyYuYanli/StudyWithNineteen): A web game for memorizing words
subentries.description: This game is developed using native HTML/JS/CSS. Players input words in the game to eliminate bullet comments, earn points, and unlock storyline dialogues.
